yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.thread
Class ChainedThreadSkeleton

java.lang.Object
  yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.thread.ChainedThreadSkeleton
All Implemented Interfaces:
IChainedThread
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoopyChainedThread, Quad2DController
public abstract class ChainedThreadSkeleton
extends Object
implements IChainedThread

Provides implementation for major part of IChainedThread and exposes execution control methods. Implementing class should use waitForRelease() method before the operation execution and releaseNext() afterwards.

Author:
Dve Yarangi
